Package org.neo4j.kernel.api.index

Interface IndexUpdater

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractLuceneIndexAccessor.AbstractLuceneIndexUpdater, CollectingIndexUpdater, DeferredConflictCheckingIndexUpdater, DelegatingIndexUpdater, EventuallyConsistentIndexUpdater, FlippableIndexProxy.LockingIndexUpdater, FulltextIndexAccessor.FulltextIndexUpdater, FulltextIndexPopulator.PopulatingFulltextIndexUpdater, FusionIndexUpdater, LuceneIndexAccessor.LuceneSchemaIndexUpdater, LuceneIndexPopulatingUpdater, MultipleIndexPopulator.MultipleIndexUpdater, NativeIndexUpdater, NonUniqueLuceneIndexPopulatingUpdater, PopulatingIndexProxy.PopulatingIndexUpdater, SwallowingIndexUpdater, UniqueLuceneIndexPopulatingUpdater, UpdateCountingIndexUpdater
    public interface IndexUpdater
extends AutoCloseable
    IndexUpdaters are responsible for updating indexes during the commit process. There is one new instance handling each commit, created from IndexAccessor. process(IndexEntryUpdate) is called for each entry, wherein the actual updates are applied. Each IndexUpdater is not thread-safe, and is assumed to be instantiated per transaction.
